title: PES ece (ec) vs manipal electronics (vlsi) (main campus.
content:
Fees difference doesn't really bother me too much, a lot of ppl say manipal is better because of college life but i don't really mind that difference either. My only concerns are academics and core jobs in placements.  
Please help me decide between the two.

comments.body: What is manipal electronics vlsi , nahh ain't no way those greedy fucks started making specialisation in ECE also now . PES is more academically oriented than manipal, manipal has a wayy Better college life than pes idk about placements of manipal

how are ece placements in pes tho?  
anyway, thanks for answering.
Ehh they usually decent but due to recession they bad
welp, mit ece had 90% placements + avg of 14 max of 27. no idea about core jobs tho.
Is this 2024? Where you got this data from
Ece placements are worse in pes..
